website_summaries.verdict: An all-in-one starter set with lots of options.
pros: A huge set of Magformers, including lots of shapes to build a wide range of large structures
The set includes 2 sizes of triangles and squares, as well as hexagons and pentagons
Wheel pieces help create vehicles that are actually mobile

customer_reviews.title: Not all pieces are included
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to learn that not everything shown on the box is included with this set. There are no bars to go between the wheels to connect them. My kids were disappointed they were unable to build the pieces that are shown on the box. I understand I should have read to see what all was included, and that is on me, but there shouldn't be photos of things on the box that cannot be made with the pieces inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set but magnetic tiles are more versatile.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set! The magnets are very strong, bright colors, a lot of pieces and the car is very nice to have too. We also have a couple of sets of magnetic tiles and i have to say that i prefer those. Somehow tiles support unrestricted creativity and imagination while these magnets, because there is only one magnet per side and the way they connect, are more restrictive as far as what can be built and how. My 9 year old enjoys this set although she mostly has to follow instructions whereas she never uses any instructions with tiles. Paid $76 for our set.
customer_reviews.author: RockyFan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but not Happy with Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Magformers is an Excellent Toy for my grandchildren and they love playing with them. My problem is with Amazon. A week after I purchased this product, Amazon lowered the price by $30 and WOULD NOT give me a price adjustment. According to them they DONT price adjust. Very disappointed in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: SRL

customer_reviews.title: Great for imaginative play, long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of the best toys I’ve bought my kids. Their imagination and critical thinking go crazy making all sorts of things. These are pretty durable and seem like they’ll last a long time. Only downside is the box it came in. The use a lot of unnecessary space to make it seem like you’re getting more than you really are. The numbers are accurate but it was just a lot of extra plastic packaging for no reason. Otherwise a great toy and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fun and engaging toy for the family
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Magformers Challenger set for my daughter's 6th birthday. She already had a small set that she loved to play all the time but this set will allow her to get creative and make more elaborate designs. She is very happy with her gift and spends hours playing with it. Her younger brother also enjoys playing and stacking magformers. My only complaint is the that the square and triangular pieces of the XL cruiser set had grey spots and splotches on the orange side. The pieces for the XL cruiser are also lighter and of poorer quality than the regular Magformers. Since my daughter is already playing with her Challenger set I won't bother to return them.
customer_reviews.author: AMY K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for imaginative builders
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves Legos and magnets and building toys in general. He can sit for hours playing with these and seems to really enjoy them. They are a little pricier than they should be considering they are made of plastic and magnets but getting lots of play out of them so they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Conner

customer_reviews.title: A great toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic toy. It has kept my son entertained for hours. This is the only magformers set we have and we have been able to create many things when free playing. I only wish there were another set of wheels included so that more than one vehicle could be made at a time. Th instruction booklet that comes with the set is designed as promotional material so many of the designs suggested require the purchase of additional sets but this didn't bother us as we prefer to design our own
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Fun, durable, and creative
customer_reviews.text: These were a holiday gift for my grandchildren, ages 4 through 11. They all love them and play with them again and again. It's wonderful to see how creative they can be with this set. They're expensive, but very durable. I bought the first set in 2016 and the kids liked them so much I bought another set the next year to add to it. NONE of the pieces from either set have broken yet, after lots and lots of play. Comes with easy to follow picture layout instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: So worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Bought them for Christmas last year, and my kids asked grandparents for more to add to the set this year. (I was very hesitant to purchase them due to the price.) They are used almost every day with my 3 boys, age 6, 3 and 1.5 They are also big enough that they can be played with even if the baby is around. (He puts everything in his mouth!) Fun to stick on metal doors too! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old daughter and 5 year old son played for hours when they got these. It was awesome, and blissfully quiet:) They got to work building all kinds of shapes, vehicles, etc.....using the included guide but moreso they're imaginations. Will definitely add to the collection at some point....great gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good investment
customer_reviews.text: My son and daughter love this Magformer set. In addition to the things they build, I've added it to our first grade math homework to help out as a physical visual to go along with common core math. We've also taken the set on roadtrips with us, putting the pieces on metal cooking trays that the kids can hold on their laps and play and build while keeping the pieces all in one place. Magformers are high quality, durable, and lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mama on the Move

customer_reviews.title: Creative and Engaging
customer_reviews.text: These are the greatest- something my kids, aging from toddler to older elementary - all enjoy playing with. (Parents too.) So far they’ve survived a month of heavy play and the aforementioned toddler smashing his creations down on the wood floors. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Celia'smom

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: This set is super cool! I got it for my 3.5 yo who loves building blocks, Legos and puzzles and she loves this! She was excited but I was even more excited!! We spend hours making various things. So neat. The magnets are strong and work well. It's also super easy to clean coz everything sticks to each other. One year old little sister did get her tiny fingers stuck in between the strong magnets and complained, so not recommending for babies ;) This set has a good amount of pieces to be creative. This is the first set we got and I'm looking forward to expanding our collection. I expect the excitement to last quite a long time.
customer_reviews.author: DV

customer_reviews.title: A gift for all ages
customer_reviews.text: These were the hit of the Christmas celebration in our house. The youngest to play with them was 2 years old. The oldest kid to play with them was 74 years old. The 4, 7 and 9 year olds spent the most time with them but a 38 year old killed well more than an hour with them. Some friends have had a set for a year with all pieces still accounted for and all still working perfectly. The pieces are hard to lose because they are colorful and stick together. The quality is excellent. There is room for plenty of creativity beyond the construction projects suggested in the manual.
customer_reviews.author: HClarkxTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Family Time is BACK!
customer_reviews.text: I may enjoy these more than my 6 year old but our entire family LOVES playing with Magformers! These little magnetic gems have taken my son away from the screen time WILLINGLY, and our family closer by giving something we can ALL do together! Thank you, Magformers!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Hours of entertainment and wonderful quality
customer_reviews.text: They seem pricey at first, but I promise you won't be disappointed! My daughter is seven and gets hours upon hours of playtime out of these blocks. This set comes with the wheel pieces as well. I was so excited when my daughter showed interest in science and what a wonderful way to demonstrate magnetism and 3D structure! The only con I can think of comes with a bit of advice: buy a container! I think younger children may become frustrated with these only because you have to create a proper frame for larger items to be sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: I believe they have changed the design a little. ...
customer_reviews.text: I believe they have changed the design a little. It seems they are now using 1 magnet vs the older style with 2. Therefore the shapes do not align properly and snap into place. I will be contacting Magformers directs to express my opinion properly soon.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Haack

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These are tons of fun. You can build so many different things my two kids loves these and play with them for a very long time each time we get them out. It comes with a book that has ideas of what to build that my son loves. All around great toy with great quality
customer_reviews.author: Kari hill

customer_reviews.title: Keeps kids busy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, which I purchased for my grandson(4). While this product is excellent for creativity, it is extremely expensive for the amount received. I purchased this because the ones I already purchased at stores were expensive (smaller amounts in box),and there just wasn't enough to build with, so this was to add on. Clean up is easy if they are stored in a metal bucket!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: We got this on an Amazon super sale. It is the first time I have ever seen them on sale anywhere so I recommend grabbing them if you ever do. They are fantastic and fun to play with for younger kids who are “stuck” between Duplos and Legos. This is a nice set with lots of pieces and interesting accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Itsme

customer_reviews.title: A great investment.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter started playing with these with HAWK EYE supervision at 2 yro and is now 5 yro and STILL insists on these for her birthday and Christmas. I highly recommend. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Akbookwormaddict

customer_reviews.title: Cool - EXPENSIVE
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy but SO expensive. I would have to recommend the larger sets if you can afford it, because you'd be very limited on what you could build with a 26-30 pc (or less) set. It's a toy that I actually like to play with whenever my son asks that I play with him (and I'm 27).
customer_reviews.author: Llyzaard

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun toy! My toddler really loves to play with these, and this really inspires her to be creative. Also, because they are magnetic, they stack up very nicely (easy cleanup, big plus for any mom!). Another big plus is that even if you step on one in the middle of the night, you won't curse and weep with pain, as you would with a piece of lego.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Pak

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fun
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the money. My daughter saw it at one of her friends and I fell in love. It is very well made and my kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Guilha Kroneberger

customer_reviews.title: Recommended, worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and no plastic smell. The magnets are all enclosed in the pieces so you don’t have to worry about your kids eating a magnet by accident. The magnets are strong and holds the pieces good. My kid loves it. She can play with this for hours. It’s a great toy to keep kids busy and hands on at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Creative.  Hard to keep your hands off them.  So much fun.
customer_reviews.text: Quality. Beautifully colored, and so sturdy. These will last for a long time. Adults and kids alike are drawn to them.
customer_reviews.author: PMC

customer_reviews.title: Both great. The various shapes of this set allow for ...
customer_reviews.text: We have these and magnatiles. Both great. The various shapes of this set allow for more dynamic creations like spheres and moving vehicles Kids use the original magnatile to make more stationary objects like buildings to use in creative play. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: BaltimoreMom

customer_reviews.title: Love it and so do my customers children.
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is a big set. I bought this set for my office for customers kids to keep busy with, omg it’s pretty huge.i am impressed
customer_reviews.author: alina martinez

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love Magformers
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how many Magformers pieces my 11 year old grandson now has but it's a lot. He is fascinated by the kits and this set was to expand his collection so he could build bigger and better things. We also added the gears set so now he is making buildings, etc, with this kit and then adding elevators. These are well made, durable pieces that should outlast most kids. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JoeTAZ

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Happiness
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter for Christmas. She loves it. She uses this product at school and was so excited to have her own at home.
customer_reviews.author: TBadgett

customer_reviews.title: My grandsons love these
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love these and asked for more after I gave one of them a smaller set for his birthday. He and his big brother both wanted more for Christmas which is why I bought this set!
customer_reviews.author: JustMyOpinion

customer_reviews.title: Great idea. Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Great invention. Not really a toy. Wonderful for a child’s imagination. My 7 yo great grandson wasn’t thrilled with it as a gift which surprised me because he really likes legos. I actually liked playing with it. Maybe when he’s older it will grab his attention.
customer_reviews.author: butitsadryheat

customer_reviews.title: Great STEM toy for children
customer_reviews.text: What can you say that hasn't been said? These are amazing. My preschool class loves them. My daughter love them. Even the parents like to play with them if they are out at pick up time. The only down side to them at all is they are very costly.....but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My grandchild was so happy to get this for Christmas. Really likes this.
customer_reviews.author: lc

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Box completely different from what's advertised and "instruction booklet" is more of an ad for more magformers then anything else. Had to go online to figure how to build the "giant ball" plus add pieces from another set to complete it. For this price I was expecting a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Super Creative Set!
customer_reviews.text: Ideas are limitless with this set. My 6 Year old is going crazy working with these. Opens her mind up to major creativity!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler J M

customer_reviews.title: BEST MOST PLAYED WITH TOY IN OUR HOUSE
customer_reviews.text: BEST MOST PLAYED WITH TOY IN OUR HOUSE! It's worth the investment! My kids (ages 5, 3 and 1) come up with super impressive creations, and I'm so happy to watch their imaginations at work! I will continue to ask for more sets as gifts because the only limitation of this toy is when their imaginations require more pieces to finish their creation.
customer_reviews.author: Glowingbliss

customer_reviews.title: Super great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 4-year old grandson, along with some of the other sets. He loves these. He and his father spend hours putting things together. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Abring

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift and was told that ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and was told that the 2 wheel bases were not included. Asked for the box back and confirmed the wheel basis where not there. However all other pieces were. I won't buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher K Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Such a great toy
customer_reviews.text: My girls (4 and 6) love them. They play with them for at least an hour a day. The book of ideas with instructions is really helpful, but they also create tons of their own ideas. The magnets are easy to use. I was hesitant because of the price, but I believe they are well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Donnaj923

customer_reviews.title: Other children love it as well
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected. The child plays with it every time he has spare moments. Durable. Other children love it as well. They play for hours. It was a Christmas gift. After playing with it almost everyday (once he's at home) since , he thanked me for it. He's 9 yrs. old.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: We love, love
customer_reviews.text: We love, love, love our Magformers. The grandkids AND adults will sit and play for hours with the Magformers, and the creations that the grandkids make are simply magnificent. Pricey, but fun!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: This toy is fun for the entire family. My two year old stays entertained for about an hour with some help separating the magnets. My sibilings stay entertained for about an hour as well. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maintained their interest.
customer_reviews.text: These things have held the kids attention and been a consistent top pick for play time for months now. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its a wonderful toy!
customer_reviews.text: Magformers are a little expensive but are worth the price.112 challenger set was a big hit in our house. It includes a variety of shapes to create.The shapes (squares, triangles) for the car are a little different from the rest of the magformer pieces.All the pieces have magformers printed on them except the pieces for the car, which are a little thin as well.Its a wonderful toy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Magformers rock. They are incredibly fun and incredibly expensive. I would like to buy much more than I have but the price is pretty steep. The amount of entertainment they have provided my 3, 5, and 7 year old is well worth it though. My 3 year old is my most creative builder and that makes me happy. It could use a better idea manual...
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Great open-ended toy for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Magformers are such a great open-ended playing opportunity toy. My baby and 6-year-old both love playing with them. Even addicting for adults to play with. I like how the instruction manual shows how to lay the pieces in a pattern on a flat surface and then lift it up in one swell swoop to create a ball. A good way to impress grandparents. :)
customer_reviews.author: Catherine K

customer_reviews.title: One of the kid's favorite toys - the only annoying thing was the instruction ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the kid's favorite toys - the only annoying thing was the instruction booklet, which had "plans" for items that require multiple sets in order to complete them - considering the cost of the set, they don't need to "save money" by having an instruction booklet covering multiple sets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The patterns from the video are not included
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent, but they do not come with the patterns shown in the video. I contacted the company that makes them, and they told me that the patterns are not available to consumers. Pretty disappointed, because I expected that the patterns would be included. Seems like false advertising to me...
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for great grandchildren and was an immediate hit with all, aged 2 to 5. Would gladly purchase more for them.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Great product, well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Children of all ages play freely with these magformers in my home. There is never a dull moment for the young and old! Well worth the money. Keep them indoors and they should last forever. The little ones are constantly asking for More.
customer_reviews.author: ka Tillson, NY

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my 3 year old grandson
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my 3 year old grandson! After he opened his Christmas gift, the adult men in the group zeroed in and started building cars and all kinds of things...a big hit for little and big boys!
customer_reviews.author: Bubba Newt

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Gave them as a gift to my daughter & she really likes them. Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Angela S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd grader has wanted these forever! Finally got them for her birthday! Endless hours of play! Try to get them for $1/piece for best value!
customer_reviews.author: B. Pluchinsky

customer_reviews.title: This is the brand my daycare uses and they are pretty dang indestructible
customer_reviews.text: Do not try and save money by getting the cheaper knock offs. I returned a cheaper brand after the kids complained they weren't very strong and got this when it went on sale. So. Worth. It. This is the brand my daycare uses and they are pretty dang indestructible!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great price. My kids love these blocks (ages 5
customer_reviews.text: Great price. My kids love these blocks (ages 5, 7, and 9)! This set was bought to increase the number of blocks available for building as it was slim pickings when all 3 play with them together. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters are 2 and 4, so they don't have the knack yet to build something big, but they love to put them into long attached lines and snap them apart and put them together again. Also like when their dad makes something that they can take apart. 5 year old cousin saw them and made a great ball with no instructions. A fun toy for all.
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: The whole family absolutely love the product and use it
customer_reviews.text: The whole family absolutely love the product and use it. The only gripe is that, at this price we feel more project plans and instructions need to be included as part of the pack...so few lets the pack down and could be improved with a dozen or so more sets of instructions. Part of the reason for making the purchase was for developing motor skills, planning as well as problem solving skills in our kids...which the product does successfully, but would definately be enhanced by further information and instructions
customer_reviews.author: deana doumas

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to tech
customer_reviews.text: This is like tinker toys with magnets. My 11 year old grandson wanted it fir Christmas and I was happy to get it. He puts his tech toys down to play with this. It’s nice to see! I highly recommend for boys or girls.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Stejer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toy. Purchased for my quadriplegic 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful toy. Purchased for my quadriplegic 7 year old, but my 10 and 12 year old boys love it as well. Great toy for those with limited mobility (CP, dystonia).
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dank

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love these - this is our second set, purchased to ward off fighting over certain pieces when they are both building.
customer_reviews.author: Brad T

customer_reviews.title: which they also love, Magformers are great for building and then taking ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous! Our 3.5 year old and 6 year old both spends heaps of time playing. Unlike Lego, which they also love, Magformers are great for building and then taking apart and building something new. Easy enough for our 3.5 year old to put together. This 112 Challenger set is a great starter - lots of pieces for building.
customer_reviews.author: Jen_Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best toy we've bought all year
customer_reviews.text: Massively popular in our household. 5 and 7 year olds both hugely into them. Probably the best toy we've bought all year, at least in terms of hours played with. I was quite surprised, I felt they were stupidly overpriced and surely not that much fun but I stand corrected.
customer_reviews.author: Dermot Conner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Imaginative Building Set
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about the creative possibilities with Magformers. We had a smaller set, so knew this really large one would be a hit.
customer_reviews.author: book-kritik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect and definitely what we were expecting. We purchased an “off” brand before these and weren’t anything like what we wanted. Totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Great for creativities.
customer_reviews.text: My kids age 3,6,9 all love this product. I ended up bought 2 sets so they can make bigger pieces. I love how they use their imagination and creativities to create different objects.
customer_reviews.author: bearcoca

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised m how much this was played with after Christmas. A bigger hit than expected. Quality toy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Scholma

customer_reviews.title: The BEST toy for your kiddos!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about these....AMAZING, WONDERFUL, EDUCATIONAL....free time for mommy and daddy!!!! My 4 year old plays with these EVERYDAY, no joke. He loves them!! Expensive but well built and worth every penny. Had them for 5 months and not one has broken...my husband is even addicted.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: My kids love Magformers! I Recommend getting a few sets to put together if you have more than one child. My 12, 9 and 5 year olds will all sit together and play with these which is probably the best part
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All 3 of my kids love these (ages 1
customer_reviews.text: All 3 of my kids love these (ages 1, 4, and 7)! They are a lot of fun to play with and a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: AidensMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and creative building set. Magnets are strong and durable.
customer_reviews.author: dabby347

customer_reviews.title: This is the TOY for all ages!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Magformers 112 Challenger Set entertained my 13 year old and my 8 year old. We used empty Christmas tins from popcorn and cookies as "magnetic" platforms to build on top. Wish the 112 set came with more wheels and it doesn't seem that you can order extra parts from the Magformers website. Great toy overall!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fav

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Two months since Christmas and these are hands-down the family's favorite. They are still getting played with every single day, easy enough for the toddler to enjoy, still engaging for the older kids. Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: MellowYellow

customer_reviews.title: Magformers are the best. My kids play with these constantly
customer_reviews.text: Magformers are the best. My kids play with these constantly.
customer_reviews.author: tina lenauer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent- the more the merrier
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for all ages! I had remorse, while I waited, for paying over $100. I also worried about negative reviews. It's worth every dollat and piece. I got it for my 4-year-old, who is great at building, and for the rest of the family.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Cuervo

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: These are great Magformers. I bought them when they were on sale. Good addition to our collection.
customer_reviews.author: 4fam

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: We first saw magformers at my sisters house. She got them for her children years ago. Our three-year-old and two-year-old love playing with them. It is enjoyable to watch how they like putting them together and they get very excited when they can make the shapes themselves. It definitely is a great toy for them to have at their age and I definitely recommend it. I would recommend about 20 pieces per child.
customer_reviews.author: Bignami

customer_reviews.title: was how much my older nieces and nephews enjoyed it -- so much so that my fourteen-year-old nephew ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our three-year-old and he loves making "flower balls" with the pentagons. This set can entertain him for a while. The bigger surprise, though, was how much my older nieces and nephews enjoyed it -- so much so that my fourteen-year-old nephew asked for a set for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M. Carleton

customer_reviews.title: The grown ups love it
customer_reviews.text: We purchased as a Christmas gift for my three year old. The grown ups like it better than he does. This is a cool set and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cummings

customer_reviews.title: You do need a substantial number of pieces to really enjoy though, like probably over 200
customer_reviews.text: These are expensive but provide hours of creative play time for our 4-year old and our 10-year old. You do need a substantial number of pieces to really enjoy though, like probably over 200.
customer_reviews.author: WiscoDad

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is a pretty sophisticated Legos builder, so I wasn't sure these would hold his interest. Boy! Did they ever. I first purchased a smaller "test" set and started getting texts with photos of his creations. He loved them so much I bought this big set and absolutely wowed him. He is a very mature 6 year old, but the neighborhood gaggle of boys goes up to 11 - and they all go straight to the Magformers. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: MarjieS

customer_reviews.title: ( of course we keep the smaller pieces away from the young toddler) The adults enjoy them as well
customer_reviews.text: These have been a hit since Christmas. These entertain a 1, 4, and 11 year old. ( of course we keep the smaller pieces away from the young toddler) The adults enjoy them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jgz

customer_reviews.title: Great creative toy
customer_reviews.text: Gift for granddaughters (2&4). They spent quite a bit of time building things
customer_reviews.author: saraher

customer_reviews.title: Ended up Being a Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but money well spent since this is one of the only toys my kid goes back to again, again, and again. He's 6 and his little 16-month old sister loves these magnetic shapes too. It's a toy that will last too.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L

customer_reviews.title: I loved these. Unfortunately my kids didn't
customer_reviews.text: I loved these. Unfortunately my kids didn't. I think they would prefer to spend their time on legos or riding bikes outside. But I thought these were just the coolest.
customer_reviews.author: GilbertAK

customer_reviews.title: My kids love magformers. They don't play with them as much ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love magformers. They don't play with them as much as I hoped they would (especialy for the price), but when they do, they really enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Adams

customer_reviews.title: They are a great STEAM toy that gets kids thinking and creating
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my kids for Christmas, however, my husband is the one who plays with them the most! They are a great STEAM toy that gets kids thinking and creating. I see this being a toy that gets played with for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: amazonfeen

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! We all play with them... toddler, teens, aunts, uncles, grandparents and great grandparents!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: I love the item
customer_reviews.text: I love the item! The post office left them on our front porch in 100% torrential downpours on Monday. The box and the booklets were damaged; however, I think the magformers will be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Steven jones

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: One of my kids (2 and 4yrs old) favorite Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H. Clawson III

customer_reviews.title: great addition to our play room! Keep the kids entertained and creating!
customer_reviews.text: great addition to our play room! Keep the kids entertained and creating!
customer_reviews.author: J. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Was delivered extremely fast!! Can't wait to give it to my son!
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: One of the best toys ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 10 year old nephew. It's definitely a great brain game. It's so much fun that I also can't stop building stuff (lol). The magformers are very well made. Very sturdy and it sticks together without breaking. It makes an awesome gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Nisha

customer_reviews.title: Idestructible!
customer_reviews.text: One of best toys I bought in the past 4 years, my 4.5 year old loves it and my 1.5 year old plays with it too, it's indestructible!!! The parts can be chewed on, stepped on, taken into the bath and so on, and they are all still in perfect order! Thinking of buying more sets!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: expensive but great
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to purchase this because of the price. But my wife wanted to get it for our son. I still think it's too expensive, but I do admit that this is a great product. we can sit and play these together, and it's a blast. It's fun and easy to make cool stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great imaginative toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set for a 6-year-old granddaughter and another for a 7-year-old grandson. Now, I think grandma needs a set for her house. Did you know adults like playing with this toy, too?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different type of pieces
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why half of the pieces do not have magformers sign on it and they are completely different

customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Definitely a hit with boys and girls. Worth every penny!

customer_reviews.text: The boys LOVE this! It is a little pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: We just gave this to our twin 6 year olds. They liked this toy. I LOVED it and had a lot of fun playing with it, the 2 year old loved it as well as the 8 year old. It is a great toy for people of all ages (although SO SO expensive).
customer_reviews.author: Julie

product_meta.title: Magformers Challenger Set (112-pieces) Deluxe Magnetic Building Blocks, Educational Magnetic Tiles Kit , Magnetic Construction shapes STEM Toy Set - 63077
product_meta.description:
Magformers Challenger 112-Piece Magnetic Building Set. Containing a wide variety of magnetic shapes, the Challenger set lets kids explore magnetic construction through modular creative play. Containing XL cruiser pieces, design and build ideas from both lines including our magic ball and super fast XL roadster. What will you challenge yourself to construct!?

BRAND STORY
By

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Perfect set for the Magformers enthusiast. More building possibilities and challenges! 112 pieces total: 48 triangles, 46 squares, 4 hexagons, 12 pentagons and 2 wheels.

See more
feature_bullets: Set includes pieces from our XL cruiser car set and rainbow pieces in 4 different geometric shapes.
112 pieces total: 48 triangles, 46 squares, 4 hexagons, 12 pentagons and 2 wheels.
Neodymium Rare-Earth Magnets for guaranteed connectivity.
ABS plastic magnets conform to CE, ASTM, and EN75
ABS plastic magnets conform to CE, ASTM and EN71
Perfect set for the Magformers enthusiast.
112 pieces total: 48 triangles, 46 squares, 4 hexagons, 12 pentagons and 2 wheels.
Compatible with all MAGFORMERS shapes. (XL Cruiser shapes not compatible with Magnets in Motion Power generator)
